writer.name: 杰德·埃利诺夫 Jed Elinoff
斯科特·艾伦·托马斯 Scott Alan Thomas
帕丽斯·希尔顿 Paris Hilton

this_title: Paris Hilton's My New BFF Season 2
trans_title: 帕丽斯·希尔顿的新闺密 第二季
introduction: Coming out of disappointment over her choice the first time around, Paris Hilton is back in search for another BFF in the second season of "Paris Hilton's My New BFF". MTV has aired a promo of the reality show, presenting more drama, fun, fights and tears.Through the TV spot, it is revealed that there will be a set of guest stars, some are unlikely. Kathy Griffin, Three 6 Mafia, Lil' Kim and more will show up to help Paris in determining who should be her next best friend. "But because I was fooled last season, I'm gonna push these BFF wannabes to the edge," Paris said.The challenges include meeting with a hungry tiger, carrying heavy luggage in heels and bikini, as well as drinking in shots.  MTV will premiere the second season on June 2. Also released are a bunch of promotional pictures including the one where Paris sits in the middle of the season 2 contestants.
chinese_title: 帕丽斯·希尔顿的新闺密 第二季
foreign_title: Paris Hilton's My New BFF Season 2
